title: Ziqi Zhao (赵梓淇)
text:
Google Scholar
  
  
    
     Github
  
  
    
     Email
  
  
    
     CV (Updated: 2024.9.14)
  

  
  




I am currently a first-year PhD student in the University of Hong Kong, under the supervision of Professor Ka-Ho Chow and Professor Siu-Ming Yiu. Previously, I graduated from École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL) in 2023 as a computer science master student. I obtained my bachelor from Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST) in 2020, with double major in computer science and mathematics.
I am working on Trustworthy Machine Learning, which aims to detect security and privacy flaws in modern machine learning systems and enhance the protection.
My research interests include but not limited to:

Trustworthy Federated Learning
AI Security and Privacy Issues in General

 News [View all] 



PhD 2024.9.25 2024.9.25 I will be joining Professor Ka-Ho Chow’s Research Group in October as a PhD student at the University of Hong Kong.


Paper 2023.4.10 2023.4.10 Our paper FIS-ONE: Floor Identification System with One Label for Crowdsourced RF Signals is accepted to ICDCS 2023!

title: About Me
text:
Work Experience



2021.7 2021.9     Summer Internship of Machine Learning, 2021.7 - 2021.9   Ketl.io, Geneva, Switzerland I scraped and parsed nearly 500,000 multi-lingual online documents. I also developed a translation and summarization service for legal documents written in Italian, French, German and English.

title: Publications
text:
This page lists all my publications.
Note: \(*\) indicates equal contribution.

ICDCS 2023  Weipeng Zhuo, Ka Ho Chiu, Jierun Chen, Ziqi Zhao, S.-H. Gary Chan, Sangtae Ha, and Chul-Ho Lee. FIS-ONE: floor identification system with one label for crowdsourced RF signals. In 2023 IEEE 43rd International Conference on Distributed Computing Systems (ICDCS). IEEE, 2023.  View PDF Code 


NeurIPS 2022  Chen Liu*, Ziqi Zhao*, Sabine Süsstrunk, and Mathieu Salzmann. Robust binary models by pruning randomly-initialized networks. In Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS). 2022.  View PDF Code Poster Slides 


ICDCS 2022  Weipeng Zhuo, Ziqi Zhao, Ka Ho Chiu, Shiju Li, Sangtae Ha, Chul-Ho Lee, and S-H Gary Chan. GRAFICS: graph embedding-based floor identification using crowdsourced RF signals. In 2022 IEEE 42nd International Conference on Distributed Computing Systems (ICDCS). IEEE, 2022.  View PDF Code Slides 


IoT-J 2020  Jiajie Tan, Edmund Sumpena, Weipeng Zhuo, Ziqi Zhao, Mengyun Liu, and S-H Gary Chan. IoT geofencing for COVID-19 home quarantine enforcement. IEEE Internet of Things Magazine, 3(3):24–29, 2020.  View
